name: age_filter
query: ${age:queryparam} ? 'AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM nearyou.users WHERE age IN (${age:csv}))' : ''

name: profession_filter
query: ${profession:queryparam} ? 'AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM nearyou.users WHERE profession IN (${profession:csv}))' : ''

name: interests_filter
query: ${interests:queryparam} ? 'AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM nearyou.users WHERE interests IN (${interests:csv}))' : ''
